description: One of Uganda's top football clubs, known for its dominance in the league.
Uganda’s most successful club with a rich history in local and continental football.
A rapidly rising club with multiple league titles and a strong youth system.
A disciplined and competitive club backed by the Uganda Revenue Authority.
One of Uganda’s oldest and most passionate football clubs.
A strong and determined team known for its aggressive attacking football.
A fan-favorite club from northern Uganda with a strong home record.
A young and ambitious club making waves in Ugandan football.
A competitive club with a growing presence in the FUFA league.
A disciplined team with a strong focus on developing local talent.
